text: Hey everyone, I am developing a web app that will host my server less functions for a public HubSpot app. I’m going to use it to authenticate the public app but I want to get it to where people can login to my web app and see that it’s connected to their HubSpot account, is the possible? I think Associ8 does this?

I feel your pain - we also ran into exactly the same problem with exactly the same outcome. Only that we asked before what products they use and cms enterprise was mentioned but turned out not to be true.
Hey this is really cool <@U01QVR44MEY>, but have you figured out how to accept webhooks while hosting the app in the HubSpot design manager?
